member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Badges.GlyphValue.None
member.summary: No glyph. If there is a numeric badge, or a glyph currently on the badge, it will be removed.

member.summary: A glyph representing application activity.

member.summary: A glyph representing busy status.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Badges.GlyphValue.NewMessage
member.summary: A glyph representing that a new message is available.

member.summary: A glyph representing that media is paused.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Badges.GlyphValue.Playing
member.summary: A glyph representing that media is playing.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentAdaptive
member.summary: Supported on all sizes. This is the recommended way of specifying your Tile content. Adaptive Tile templates are the de-facto choice for Windows 10, and you can create a wide variety of custom Tiles through adaptive.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentAdaptive.#ctor
member.summary: Supported on all sizes. This is the recommended way of specifying your Tile content. Adaptive Tile templates are the de-facto choice for Windows 10, and you can create a wide variety of custom Tiles through adaptive.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentAdaptive.Children
member.summary: , , and objects can be added as children. The children are displayed in a vertical StackPanel fashion.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentAdaptive.BackgroundImage
member.summary: An optional background image that gets displayed behind all the tile content, full bleed.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentAdaptive.PeekImage
member.summary: An optional peek image that animates in from the top of the tile.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentAdaptive.TextStacking
member.summary: Controls the text stacking (vertical alignment) of the entire binding element.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.ITileAdaptiveChild
member.summary: Elements (, , ) that can be direct children of .

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileGroup
member.summary: Groups semantically identify that the content in the group must either be displayed as a whole, or not displayed if it cannot fit. Groups also allow creating multiple columns.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileGroup.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new tile group. Groups semantically identify that the content in the group must either be displayed as a whole, or not displayed if it cannot fit. Groups also allow creating multiple columns.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileGroup.Children
member.summary: The only valid children of groups are . Each subgroup is displayed as a separate vertical column.

member.summary: Provide the source of the image and other image source related properties.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImage.Crop
member.summary: Control the desired cropping of the image.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImage.RemoveMargin
member.summary: By default, images have an 8px margin around them. You can remove this margin by setting this property to true.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImage.Align
member.summary: The horizontal alignment of the image.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImage.ToString
member.summary: Returns the image's source string.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TilePeekImage
member.summary: A peek image that animates in from the top of the tile.

member.summary: Initializes a peek image that animates in from the top of the tile.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TilePeekImage.Source
member.summary: Provide the source of the image and other image source related properties.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TilePeekImage.Overlay
member.summary: New in 1511: A black overlay on the peek image. This value controls the opacity of the black overlay, with 0 being no overlay and 100 being completely black. Defaults to 0. Previously for RTM: Did not exist, value will be ignored and peek image will be displayed with 0 overlay.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TilePeekImage.Crop
member.summary: New in 1511: Control the desired cropping of the image. Previously for RTM: Did not exist, value will be ignored and peek image will be displayed without any cropping.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBackgroundImage
member.summary: A full-bleed background image that appears beneath the tile content.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBackgroundImage.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a full-bleed background image that appears beneath the tile content.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBackgroundImage.Source
member.summary: Provide the source of the image and other image source related properties.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBackgroundImage.Overlay
member.summary: A black overlay on the background image. This value controls the opacity of the black overlay, with 0 being no overlay and 100 being completely black. Defaults to 20.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBackgroundImage.Crop
member.summary: New in 1511: Control the desired cropping of the image. Previously for RTM: Did not exist, value will be ignored and peek image will be displayed without any cropping.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImageAlign
member.summary: Specifies the horizontal alignment for an image.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImageAlign.Stretch
member.summary: Default value. Image stretches to fill available width (and potentially available height too, depending on where the image is).

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImageAlign.Left
member.summary: Align the image to the left, displaying the image at its native resolution.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImageAlign.Center
member.summary: Align the image in the center horizontally, displaying the image at its native resolution.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImageAlign.Right
member.summary: Align the image to the right, displaying the image at its native resolution.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImageCrop
member.summary: Specify the desired cropping of the image.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImageCrop.None
member.summary: Default value. Image is not cropped.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImageCrop.Circle
member.summary: Image is cropped to a circle shape.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileText

member.summary: Initializes a new adaptive text element.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileText.Text
member.summary: The text to display.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileText.Lang
member.summary: The target locale of the XML payload, specified as a BCP-47 language tags such as "en-US" or "fr-FR". The locale specified here overrides any other specified locale, such as that in binding or visual. If this value is a literal string, this attribute defaults to the user's UI language. If this value is a string reference, this attribute defaults to the locale chosen by Windows Runtime in resolving the string.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileText.Style
member.summary: The style controls the text's font size, weight, and opacity.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileText.Wrap
member.summary: Set this to true to enable text wrapping. False by default.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileText.MaxLines
member.summary: The maximum number of lines the text element is allowed to display.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileText.MinLines
member.summary: The minimum number of lines the text element must display.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileText.Align
member.summary: The horizontal alignment of the text.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileText.ToString
member.summary: Returns the value of the Text property.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextAlign
member.summary: Controls the horizontal alignment of text.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextAlign.Auto

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextAlign.Left

member.summary: Horizontally align the text in the center.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextAlign.Right
member.summary: Horizontally align the text to the right.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle
member.summary: Text style controls font size, weight, and opacity.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.Caption

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.CaptionSubtle

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.Body
member.summary: H5 font size.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.BodySubtle
member.summary: Same as Body but with subtle opacity.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.Base
member.summary: H5 font size, bold weight. Essentially the bold version of Body.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.BaseSubtle
member.summary: Same as Base but with subtle opacity.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.Subtitle
member.summary: H4 font size.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.SubtitleSubtle
member.summary: Same as Subtitle but with subtle opacity.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.Title
member.summary: H3 font size.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.TitleSubtle
member.summary: Same as Title but with subtle opacity.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.TitleNumeral
member.summary: Same as Title but with top/bottom padding removed.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.Subheader
member.summary: H2 font size.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.SubheaderSubtle
member.summary: Same as Subheader but with subtle opacity.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.SubheaderNumeral
member.summary: Same as Subheader but with top/bottom padding removed.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.Header
member.summary: H1 font size.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.HeaderSubtle
member.summary: Same as Header but with subtle opacity.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileTextStyle.HeaderNumeral
member.summary: Same as Header but with top/bottom padding removed.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.Element_TileBinding.AddImageQuery
member.summary:
Set to true to allow Windows to append a query string to the image URI supplied in the tile notification. Use this attribute if your server hosts images and can handle query strings, either by retrieving an image variant based on the query strings or by ignoring the query string and returning the image as specified without the query string. This query string specifies scale, contrast setting, and language; for instance, a value of
"www.website.com/images/hello.png"
included in the notification becomes
"www.website.com/images/hello.png?ms-scale=100&ms-contrast=standard&ms-lang=en-us"

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.Element_TileBinding.BaseUri
member.summary: A default base URI that is combined with relative URIs in image source attributes.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.Element_TileBinding.Branding
member.summary: The form that the tile should use to display the app's brand.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.Element_TileBinding.ContentId
member.summary:
Set to a sender-defined string that uniquely identifies the content of the notification. This prevents duplicates in the situation where a large tile template is displaying the last three wide tile notifications.
Required: NO

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.Element_TileBinding.DisplayName
member.summary: An optional string to override the tile's display name while showing this notification.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.Element_TileBinding.Language
member.summary: The target locale of the XML payload, specified as a BCP-47 language tags such as "en-US" or "fr-FR". The locale specified here overrides that in visual, but can be overriden by that in text. If this value is a literal string, this attribute defaults to the user's UI language. If this value is a string reference, this attribute defaults to the locale chosen by Windows Runtime in resolving the string. See Remarks for when this value isn't specified.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.Element_TileBinding.CheckOverlayValue(System.Int32)
member.summary: Throws exception if value is invalid

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.Element_TileBinding.Descendants
member.summary: Generates an enumerable collection of children and all those children's children

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentContact
member.summary: Phone-only. Supported on Small, Medium, and Wide.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentContact.#ctor
member.summary: Phone-only. Supported on Small, Medium, and Wide.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentContact.Image
member.summary: The image to display.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentContact.Text
member.summary: NOT DISPLAYED ON SMALL TILE SIZE. A line of text that is displayed.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentIconic
member.summary: Supported on Small and Medium. Enables an iconic tile template, where you can have an icon and badge display next to each other on the tile, in true classic Windows Phone style. The number next to the icon is achieved through a separate badge notification.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentIconic.#ctor
member.summary: Supported on Small and Medium. Enables an iconic tile template, where you can have an icon and badge display next to each other on the tile, in true classic Windows Phone style. The number next to the icon is achieved through a separate badge notification.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentIconic.Icon
member.summary: At minimum, to support both Desktop and Phone, Small and Medium tiles, provide a square aspect ratio image with a resolution of 200x200, PNG format, with transparency and no color other than white. For more info see: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/tiles_and_toasts/archive/2015/07/31/iconic-tile-template-for-windows-10.aspx

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentPeople
member.summary: New in 1511: Supported on Medium, Wide, and Large (Desktop and Mobile). Previously for RTM: Phone-only. Supported on Medium and Wide.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentPeople.#ctor
member.summary: New in 1511: Supported on Medium, Wide, and Large (Desktop and Mobile). Previously for RTM: Phone-only. Supported on Medium and Wide.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentPeople.Images
member.summary: Images that will roll around as circles.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentPhotos
member.summary: Animates through a slideshow of photos. Supported on all sizes.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentPhotos.#ctor
member.summary: Animates through a slideshow of photos. Supported on all sizes.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBindingContentPhotos.Images
member.summary: Up to 9 images can be provided, which will be used for the slideshow. Adding more than 9 will throw an exception.

member.summary: The target locale of the XML payload, specified as a BCP-47 language tags such as "en-US" or "fr-FR". member.summary: Initializes a binding element, which contains the visual content for a specific tile size.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBinding.Language
member.summary: The target locale of the XML payload, specified as a BCP-47 language tags such as "en-US" or "fr-FR". The locale specified here overrides that in visual, but can be overriden by that in text. If this value is a literal string, this attribute defaults to the user's UI language. If this value is a string reference, this attribute defaults to the locale chosen by Windows Runtime in resolving the string. See Remarks for when this value isn't specified.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBinding.BaseUri
member.summary: A default base URI that is combined with relative URIs in image source attributes. Defaults to null.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBinding.Branding
member.summary: The form that the tile should use to display the app's brand..

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBinding.AddImageQuery
member.summary:
Defaults to false. Set to true to allow Windows to append a query string to the image URI supplied in the tile notification. Use this attribute if your server hosts images and can handle query strings, either by retrieving an image variant based on the query strings or by ignoring the query string and returning the image as specified without the query string. This query string specifies scale, contrast setting, and language; for instance, a value of
"www.website.com/images/hello.png"
included in the notification becomes
"www.website.com/images/hello.png?ms-scale=100&ms-contrast=standard&ms-lang=en-us"

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBinding.ContentId
member.summary: Set to a sender-defined string that uniquely identifies the content of the notification. This prevents duplicates in the situation where a large tile template is displaying the last three wide tile notifications.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBinding.DisplayName
member.summary: An optional string to override the tile's display name while showing this notification.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBinding.Content
member.summary: The actual content to be displayed. One of , , , , or

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.ITileBindingContent
member.summary: Visual tile content. One of , , , , or .

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBranding
member.summary: The form that the tile should use to display the app's brand.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBranding.Auto
member.summary: The default choice. If ShowNameOn___ is true for the tile size being displayed, then branding will be "Name". Otherwise it will be "None".

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBranding.None
member.summary: No branding will be displayed.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBranding.Name
member.summary: The DisplayName will be shown.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBranding.Logo
member.summary: Desktop-only. The Square44x44Logo will be shown. On Mobile, this will fallback to Name.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileBranding.NameAndLogo
member.summary: Desktop-only. Both the DisplayName and Square44x44Logo will be shown. On Mobile, this will fallback to Name.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileContent
member.summary: Base tile element, which contains a single visual element.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileContent.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a tile notification's content. You must then set the Visual property, which is required for a tile notification.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileContent.Visual
member.summary: The visual element is required.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileContent.GetContent
member.summary: Retrieves the notification XML content as a string, so that it can be sent with a HTTP POST in a push notification.
member.returns: The notification XML content as a string.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImageSource
member.summary: Defines a tile image source and related properties.

member.summary: Constructs an image source with all the required properties.
member.param: The URI of the image source. Can be from your application package, application data, or the internet.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImageSource.Src
member.summary: The URI of the image source. Can be from your application package, application data, or the internet.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImageSource.Alt
member.summary: A description of the image, for users of assistive technologies.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImageSource.AddImageQuery
member.summary: Set to true to allow Windows to append a query string to the image URI supplied in the tile notification. Use this attribute if your server hosts images and can handle query strings, either by retrieving an image variant based on the query strings or by ignoring the query string and returning the image as specified without the query string. This query string specifies scale, contrast setting, and language.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileImageSource.ToString
member.summary: Returns the value of the Src property.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual
member.summary: Contains multiple binding child elements, each of which defines a tile.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a tile notification's visual element, which can contain multiple tile size bindings, each defining the visuals for a specific tile size.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.Version
member.summary: The version of the tile XML schema this particular payload was developed for. Windows 10 ignores this property.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.Language
member.summary: The target locale of the XML payload, specified as a BCP-47 language tags such as "en-US" or "fr-FR". This locale is overridden by any locale specified in binding or text. If this value is a literal string, this attribute defaults to the user's UI language. If this value is a string reference, this attribute defaults to the locale chosen by Windows Runtime in resolving the string.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.BaseUri
member.summary: A default base URI that is combined with relative URIs in image source attributes.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.Branding
member.summary: The form that the tile should use to display the app's brand.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.AddImageQuery
member.summary:
Defaults to false. Set to true to allow Windows to append a query string to the image URI supplied in the tile notification. Use this attribute if your server hosts images and can handle query strings, either by retrieving an image variant based on the query strings or by ignoring the query string and returning the image as specified without the query string. This query string specifies scale, contrast setting, and language; for instance, a value of
"www.website.com/images/hello.png"
included in the notification becomes
"www.website.com/images/hello.png?ms-scale=100&ms-contrast=standard&ms-lang=en-us"

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.ContentId
member.summary: Set to a sender-defined string that uniquely identifies the content of the notification. This prevents duplicates in the situation where a large tile template is displaying the last three wide tile notifications.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.DisplayName
member.summary: An optional string to override the tile's display name while showing this notification.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.LockDetailedStatus1
member.summary: If you specify this, you must also provide a Wide tile binding. This is the first line of text that will be displayed on the lock screen if the user has selected your tile as their detailed status app.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.LockDetailedStatus2
member.summary: If you specify this, you must also provide a Wide tile binding. This is the second line of text that will be displayed on the lock screen if the user has selected your tile as their detailed status app.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.LockDetailedStatus3
member.summary: If you specify this, you must also provide a Wide tile binding. This is the third line of text that will be displayed on the lock screen if the user has selected your tile as their detailed status app.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.TileSmall
member.summary: Provide an optional small binding to specify content for the small tile size.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.TileMedium
member.summary: Provide an optional medium binding to specify content for the medium tile size.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.TileWide
member.summary: Provide an optional wide binding to specify content for the wide tile size.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.TileLarge
member.summary: Desktop-only. Provide an optional large binding to specify content for the large tile size.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.TileVisual.TryReuseTextElementForLockDetailedText(System.Int32,System.String,NotificationsExtensions.Tiles.Element_TileBinding)
member.summary: Attempts to find and re-use an existing text element inside the binding. Returns true if it could. Otherwise returns false, and the caller will have to specify the detailed status using the lock hint attribute.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastActivationType
member.summary: Decides the type of activation that will be used when the user interacts with the toast notification.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastActivationType.Foreground
member.summary: Default value. Your foreground app is launched.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastActivationType.Background
member.summary: Your corresponding background task (assuming you set everything up) is triggered, and you can execute code in the background (like sending the user's quick reply message) without interrupting the user.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastActivationType.Protocol
member.summary: Launch a different app using protocol activation.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastDuration
member.summary: The amount of time the toast should display.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastDuration.Short
member.summary: Default value. Toast appears for a short while and then goes into Action Center.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastDuration.Long
member.summary: Toast stays on-screen for longer, and then goes into Action Center.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastScenario
member.summary: Specifies the scenario, controlling behaviors about the toast.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastScenario.Default
member.summary: The normal toast behavior. The toast appears for a short duration, and then automatically dismisses into Action Center.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastScenario.Alarm
member.summary: Causes the toast to stay on-screen and expanded until the user takes action. Also causes a looping alarm sound to be selected by default.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastScenario.Reminder
member.summary: Causes the toast to stay on-screen and expanded until the user takes action.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastScenario.IncomingCall
member.summary: Causes the toast to stay on-screen and expanded until the user takes action (on Mobile this expands to full screen). Also causes a looping incoming call sound to be selected by default.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastAction.Content
member.summary: The text to be displayed on the button.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastAction.Arguments
member.summary: The arguments attribute describes the app-defined data that the app can later retrieve once it is activated from user taking this action.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastAction.ImageUri
member.summary: imageUri is optional and is used to provide an image icon for this action to display inside the button alone with the text content.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastAction.InputId
member.summary: This is specifically used for the quick reply scenario.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastActivationType.Foreground
member.summary: Default value. Your foreground app is launched.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastActivationType.Background
member.summary: Your corresponding background task (assuming you set everything up) is triggered, and you can execute code in the background (like sending the user's quick reply message) without interrupting the user.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastActivationType.Protocol
member.summary: Launch a different app using protocol activation.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastActivationType.System
member.summary: System handles the activation.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastAudio.Src
member.summary: The media file to play in place of the default sound. This can either be a ms-winsoundevent value, or a custom ms-appx:/// or ms-appdata:/// file, or null for the default sound.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastAudio.Silent
member.summary: True to mute the sound; false to allow the toast notification sound to play.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastBinding.AddImageQuery
member.summary:
Set to true to allow Windows to append a query string to the image URI supplied in the tile notification. Use this attribute if your server hosts images and can handle query strings, either by retrieving an image variant based on the query strings or by ignoring the query string and returning the image as specified without the query string. This query string specifies scale, contrast setting, and language; for instance, a value of
"www.website.com/images/hello.png"
included in the notification becomes
"www.website.com/images/hello.png?ms-scale=100&ms-contrast=standard&ms-lang=en-us"

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastBinding.BaseUri
member.summary: A default base URI that is combined with relative URIs in image source attributes.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastBinding.Language
member.summary: The target locale of the XML payload, specified as a BCP-47 language tags such as "en-US" or "fr-FR". The locale specified here overrides that in visual, but can be overriden by that in text. If this value is a literal string, this attribute defaults to the user's UI language. If this value is a string reference, this attribute defaults to the locale chosen by Windows Runtime in resolving the string. See Remarks for when this value isn't specified.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastImageCrop
member.summary: Specify the desired cropping of the image.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastImageCrop.None
member.summary: Default value. Image is not cropped.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastImageCrop.Circle
member.summary: Image is cropped to a circle shape.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastInput.Id
member.summary: The id attribute is required and is for developers to retrieve user inputs once the app is activated (in the foreground or background).

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastInput.Title
member.summary: The title attribute is optional and is for developers to specify a title for the input for shells to render when there is affordance.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastInput.PlaceholderContent
member.summary: The placeholderContent attribute is optional and is the grey-out hint text for text input type. This attribute is ignored when the input type is not text.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastInput.DefaultInput
member.summary: The defaultInput attribute is optional and it allows developer to provide a default input value.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastSelection.Id
member.summary: The id attribute is required and it is for apps to retrieve back the user selected input after the app is activated.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.Element_ToastSelection.Content
member.summary: The text to display for this selection element.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastActionsSnoozeAndDismiss
member.summary: Automatically constructs a selection box for snooze intervals, and snooze/dismiss buttons, all automatically localized, and snoozing logic is automatically handled by the system.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastActionsSnoozeAndDismiss.#ctor
member.summary: Automatically constructs a selection box for snooze intervals, and snooze/dismiss buttons, all automatically localized, and snoozing logic is automatically handled by the system.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastActionsCustom
member.summary: Create your own custom actions, using controls like , , and .

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of custom actions, which can use controls like , , and .

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastActionsCustom.Inputs
member.summary: Inputs like and can be added to the toast. Only up to 5 inputs can be added; after that, an exception is thrown.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastActionsCustom.Buttons
member.summary: Buttons are displayed after all the inputs (or adjacent to inputs if used as quick reply buttons). Only up to 5 buttons can be added; after that, an exception is thrown. You can add , , or

member.summary: An input element on a toast notification. One of or .

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.IToastActions
member.summary: Actions to display on a toast notification. One of or .

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastAppLogo
member.summary: The logo that is displayed on your toast notification.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a toast app logo, which can override the logo displayed on your toast notification.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastAppLogo.Source
member.summary: Specify the image source.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastAppLogo.Crop
member.summary: Specify how you would like the image to be cropped.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastAudio
member.summary: Specify audio to be played when the toast notification is received.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastAudio.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of toast audio, which specifies what audio to play when the toast notification is received.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastAudio.Src
member.summary: The media file to play in place of the default sound.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastAudio.Loop
member.summary: Set to true if the sound should repeat as long as the toast is shown; false to play only once (default).

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastAudio.Silent
member.summary: True to mute the sound; false to allow the toast notification sound to play (default).

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.IToastButton
member.summary: One of , , or .

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButton
member.summary: A button that the user can click on a toast notification.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButton.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a toast button with the required properties.
member.param: The text to display on the button.
App-defined string of arguments that the app can later retrieve once it is activated when the user clicks the button.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButton.Content
member.summary: Required. The text to display on the button.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButton.Arguments
member.summary: Required. App-defined string of arguments that the app can later retrieve once it is activated when the user clicks the button.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButton.ActivationType
member.summary: Controls what type of activation this button will use when clicked. Defaults to Foreground.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButton.ImageUri
member.summary: An optional image icon for the button to display (required for buttons adjacent to inputs like quick reply).

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButton.TextBoxId
member.summary: Specify the ID of an existing in order to have this button display to the right of the input, achieving a quick reply scenario.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButtonDismiss
member.summary: A button that, when clicked, is interpreted as a "dismiss" by the system, and the toast is dismissed just like if the user swiped the toast away.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButtonDismiss.CustomContent
member.summary: Custom text displayed on the button that overrides the default localized "Dismiss" text.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButtonDismiss.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a system-handled dismiss button that displays localized "Dismiss" text on the button.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButtonDismiss.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a system-handled dismiss button that displays your text on the button.
member.param: The text you want displayed on the button.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButtonSnooze
member.summary: A system-handled snooze button that automatically handles snoozing of a toast notification.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButtonSnooze.CustomContent
member.summary: Custom text displayed on the button that overrides the default localized "Snooze" text.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButtonSnooze.SelectionBoxId
member.summary: Optionally specify the ID of an existing in order to allow the user to pick a custom snooze time. The ID's of the s inside the selection box must represent the snooze interval in minutes. For example, if the user selects an item that has an ID of "120", then the notification will be snoozed for 2 hours. When the user clicks this button, if you specified a SelectionBoxId, the system will parse the ID of the selected item and snooze by that amount of minutes. If you didn't specify a SelectionBoxId, the system will snooze by the default system snooze time.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButtonSnooze.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a system-handled snooze button that displays localized "Snooze" text on the button and automatically handles snoozing.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastButtonSnooze.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a system-handled snooze button that displays your text on the button and automatically handles snoozing.
member.param: The text you want displayed on the button.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastContent
member.summary: Base toast element, which contains at least a visual element.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastContent.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of toast content. You must then set the Visual property, which is required for a toast notification. You can optionally set Audio, Actions, and more.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastContent.Visual
member.summary: The visual element is required.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastContent.Audio
member.summary: Specify custom audio options.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastContent.Actions
member.summary: Optionally create custom actions with buttons and inputs (using ) or optionally use the system-default snooze/dismiss controls (with ).

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastContent.Scenario
member.summary: Specify the scenario, to make the toast behave like an alarm, reminder, or more.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastContent.Duration
member.summary: The amount of time the toast should display. You typically should use the Scenario attribute instead, which impacts how long a toast stays on screen.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastContent.Launch
member.summary: A string that is passed to the application when it is activated by the toast. The format and contents of this string are defined by the app for its own use. When the user taps or clicks the toast to launch its associated app, the launch string provides the context to the app that allows it to show the user a view relevant to the toast content, rather than launching in its default way.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastContent.ActivationType
member.summary: Specifies what activation type will be used when the user clicks the body of this toast.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastContent.GetContent
member.summary: Retrieves the notification XML content as a string, so that it can be sent with a HTTP POST in a push notification.
member.returns: The notification XML content as a string.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastImageSource
member.summary: Defines a toast image source and related properties.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastImageSource.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an image source with all the required properties.
member.param: The URI of the image source. Can be from your application package, application data, or the internet.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastImageSource.Src
member.summary: The URI of the image source. Can be from your application package, application data, or the internet.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastImageSource.Alt
member.summary: A description of the image, for users of assistive technologies.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastImageSource.AddImageQuery
member.summary: Set to true to allow Windows to append a query string to the image URI supplied in the tile notification. Use this attribute if your server hosts images and can handle query strings, either by retrieving an image variant based on the query strings or by ignoring the query string and returning the image as specified without the query string. This query string specifies scale, contrast setting, and language.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastImageSource.ToString
member.summary: Returns the value of the Src property.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastImage
member.summary: An inline image displayed in your toast notification.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastImage.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs an inline image that can be displayed on a toast notification.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastImage.Source
member.summary: Specify the image source.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastSelectionBox
member.summary: A selection box control, which lets users pick from a dropdown list of options.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastSelectionBox.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new toast SelectionBox input control with the required elements.
member.param: Developer-provided ID that the developer uses later to retrieve input when the toast is interacted with.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastSelectionBox.Id
member.summary: The ID property is required, and is used so that developers can retrieve user input once the app is activated.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastSelectionBox.Title
member.summary: Title text to display above the SelectionBox.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastSelectionBox.DefaultSelectionBoxItemId
member.summary: This controls which item is selected by default, and refers to the Id property of . If you do not provide this, the default selection will be empty (user sees nothing).

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastSelectionBox.Items
member.summary: The selection items that the user can pick from in this SelectionBox. Only 5 items can be added.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastSelectionBoxItem
member.summary: A selection box item (an item that the user can select from the drop down list).

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastSelectionBoxItem.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new toast SelectionBoxItem with the required elements.
member.param: Developer-provided ID that the developer uses later to retrieve input when the toast is interacted with.
String that is displayed on the selection item. This is what the user sees.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastSelectionBoxItem.Id
member.summary: The ID property is required, and is used so that developers can retrieve user input once the app is activated.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastSelectionBoxItem.Content
member.summary: The Content property is required, and is a string that is displayed on the selection item.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastText
member.summary: Defines a text element to be displayed on the toast notification.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastText.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new text element that can be displayed on a toast notification.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastText.Text
member.summary: The text to display.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastText.Language
member.summary: The target locale of the XML payload, specified as a BCP-47 language tags such as "en-US" or "fr-FR". The locale specified here overrides any other specified locale, such as that in binding or visual. If this value is a literal string, this attribute defaults to the user's UI language. If this value is a string reference, this attribute defaults to the locale chosen by Windows Runtime in resolving the string.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastTextBox
member.summary: A text box control on the toast that a user can type text into.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastTextBox.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new toast TextBox input control with the required elements.
member.param: Developer-provided ID that the developer uses later to retrieve input when the toast is interacted with.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastTextBox.Id
member.summary: The ID property is required, and is used so that developers can retrieve user input once the app is activated.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastTextBox.Title
member.summary: Title text to display above the text box.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastTextBox.PlaceholderContent
member.summary: Placeholder text to be displayed on the text box when the user hasn't typed any text yet.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastTextBox.DefaultInput
member.summary: The initial text to place in the text box. Leave this null for a blank text box.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastVisual
member.summary: Defines the visual aspects of a toast notification.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastVisual.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance that defines the visual aspects of a toast notification.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastVisual.Version
member.summary: The version of the tile XML schema this particular payload was developed for. Windows 10 ignores this property.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastVisual.Language
member.summary: The target locale of the XML payload, specified as BCP-47 language tags such as "en-US" or "fr-FR". This locale is overridden by any locale specified in binding or text. If this value is a literal string, this attribute defaults to the user's UI language. If this value is a string reference, this attribute defaults to the locale chosen by Windows Runtime in resolving the string.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastVisual.BaseUri
member.summary: A default base URI that is combined with relative URIs in image source attributes.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastVisual.AddImageQuery
member.summary: Set to "true" to allow Windows to append a query string to the image URI supplied in the toast notification. Use this attribute if your server hosts images and can handle query strings, either by retrieving an image variant based on the query strings or by ignoring the query string and returning the image as specified without the query string. This query string specifies scale, contrast setting, and language.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastVisual.TitleText
member.summary: The title text displayed on the toast notification, shown as the first line of text.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastVisual.BodyTextLine1
member.summary: The first line of body text (after the title)

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastVisual.BodyTextLine2
member.summary: The second line of body text

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastVisual.InlineImages
member.summary: Inline images to display after the lines of text. Only 6 images are allowed. Adding more than 6 will throw an exception.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.Toasts.ToastVisual.AppLogoOverride
member.summary: An optional override of the logo displayed on the toast notification.
